Experienced in marketing research analytics building data collection, data processing, analysis, reporting and visualization tools.

I've recently completed the AWS Certified Data Analytics Specialty and AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate exams and am interested in working with the AWS suite of analytics tools.

Currently building marketing research analytics solutions for automotive brand tracking programs using a variety of software development tools such as Java, MongoDB, Pyramid, Python, Airflow, Spring, SQL Alchemy, Pandas and XLSXWriter. We provide these services to the worlds leading automotive manufacturers.

Interested in roles using AWS services such as Glue, Kinesis, Redshift, EMR, Data Pipeline, Spark, Kafka and Elasticsearch. I enjoy working in the Python ecosystem and am looking for interesting Data Engineer or Software Engineer positions focused on data platforms.

Proficient Linux User.

If this sounds interesting message me.
